Title: Chapter 4
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Rick Cleveland, Beau Willimon, Sam Forman (staff writer), Kate Barnow (story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Kate Mara, Michael Kelly
Plot: Francis shakes down the Congressional leadership. Zoe is offered the promotion of White House Correspondent and doesn't know if she should take it or not.
